thread.title: McConnell wants an immigration solution this week

title: McConnell wants an immigration solution this week
text:
McConnell wants an immigration solution this week 4:58am IST - 00:42 
Republicans and Democrats in the U.S. Senate should be able to come together on a solution over immigration policy by the end of the week, U.S. Senate Majority Leader Mitch McConnell told reporters on Tuesday. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
